text: @SpeakerPelosi This, just like the stunt by Sec. Espey who talked about a drug interdiction campaign, are the result of Trump's desperation to keep positive news about him in front of America instead of ensuring America is getting the facts and truth about coronavirus.  A leadership vacuum.
